ERASE_START_ADDRESS

Absolute Address:
Base Offset:
0x1000
Size:
0x4

Description

Erase cycle start address (note: devices typically require erase to start on block boundary).

Contents

Bits Identifier Access Reset Decoded Name
[31:0] ERASE_START_ADDRESS rw 0x0 -

Field Descriptions

ERASE_START_ADDRESS

Erase start address
